Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p: dont don't be worried about me i hope i shall be all right again my nerviousnervous system is very much out of order i know i have brought in on by worrying but i cant can't seem to get over it my head feels bad sometimes my rheumatics is better if i could be with you dear waltWalt i would be glad it wasent wasn't right for me to come here to live

as things has not been as i could wish but i hope i shall get a better appetite some time as i have such trembling spels spells its all my nerves i know dont don't worry walterWalter dear i hope your mother will get better if i could get away from here i would be glad georgeGeorge is good to me but he aint ain't home much of his time
you must come on the 1 of the month
